summary: This document appears to be a prison log or administrative record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, detailing the dates and times Jeffrey Epstein was placed under psych observation and the utilization of a UM (Unusual Movement) companion. It covers the period from July 23, 2019, to July 30, 2019.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the inmate being transferred to psych observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.context: The Associate Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York is listed as the author or responsible official on this confidential document.

connections.description: The Associate Warden is the prison administrator responsible for the facility where Epstein was held, as indicated by the document's header.

events.title: UM Companion Assumes Duties
events.description: An Unusual Movement (UM) companion assumed duties from staff at 7:00 am to monitor Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Transferred to Psych Observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psych observation at 8:45 am, where the UM companion continued to be utilized.

events.title: Psych Observation Ends
events.description: Epstein's period in psych observation ended at 8:15 am.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was placed under psych observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 24, 2019, at 8:45 am.
An Unusual Movement (UM) companion was utilized to monitor Epstein from July 23, 2019, at 7:00 am until at least July 30, 2019, at 8:15 am.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and originates from the Southern District of New York (SDNY), indicating it is an official prison administrative record.
